Long-term capital appreciation is a secondary objective. The Fund will seek to meet its objectives by investing in a broad array of Fixed Income Instruments which in the Investment Advisor’s view typically generate attractive levels of income. The Fund will generally allocate its assets among several investment sectors, which may include (i) high yield and investment grade bonds and other Fixed Income Instruments issued by corporations, governments, their agencies and instrumentalities located in the Asia ex-Japan countries; (ii) bonds and other Fixed Income Instruments issued by corporations, governments and issuers other than set out in (i); (iii) mortgage-related and other assetbacked securities (which are unleveraged); and (iv) foreign currency positions, including currencies of emerging market countries.","hsbcCategoryCode":"AS","hsbcCategoryName":"Asian Fixed Income","dividendYield":5.50418,"distributionFrequency":"Monthly","riskLvlCde":"2","currency":"HKD","expenseRatio":null,"marginRatio":null,"initialCharge":2,"annualManagementFee":1.5,"assetsUnderManagement":244264841,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"N","investmentRegionCode":"AP","investmentRegionName":"Asia Pacific","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"Y","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-07-31","riskFreeRateName":"USTREAS T-Bill Auction Ave 3 Mon","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":"Morningstar Asia USD Brd Mkt GR USD","dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-12","prodStatCde":"C","allowBuy":"N","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"N","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"N","annualReportDate":"2024-12-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2025-04-11","weekRangeHighDate":"2024-10-02"}}}
